name: Urban Explorer Adventure Game (Oculus Rift Support)
blurb: Explore a massive ruined city, discover the history and secrets behind its downfall. Your choices will alter the story.

rewards.reward: [Just Helping Out] ============================ Thanks for showing your support of the project!
[Early Bird Special] ============================ You will get a digital copy of the game upon completion and a desktop wallpaper. A $30 retail value.
[The Basic Package] ==============================\r\nIf you missed the early package. You will get a digital copy of the game upon completion and a desktop wallpaper.  A $30 retail value.
[The Basic Package Plus Beta] ============================== You will get everything from the Basic Package and you will get exclusive beta access before we go into live beta.

[The Alpha Dog] =============================
All the benefits of the basic package plus closed alpha access before we go into early access. 
=============================
You will also be credited as an official backer in the end-credits. This package includes beta access. 
=============================
We will also throw in a digital copy of the original game soundtrack.

[The Limited Alpha Dog Deluxe Package] \r\n==============================\r\nAll the perks of the Alpha Dog package plus a T-shirt, poster and the authentic "Motorland City Welcomes You" rack card included! Free shipping in the United States. $80 Retail value! Only the first 100 Backers are going to get this great deal!

[The Great Book of Backers] ==============================\r\nGet all the perks of all previous reward tiers plus your name credited in our super secret Backer credits book! You can have your name in a special book that players will find exploring one of the abandoned locations. When a player finds the book in-game, they will flip through pages of Backer names. Who needs boring end-credits when you can be in the game!

[The Family Portrait] =================================\r\nOften times during urban exploration an explorer will stumble upon an old family portrait or a picture of someone. With this tier you will get all previous rewards and a chance to have your own family portrait or any picture you like in the game. As a player explores the ruins of Motorland City they will find old pictures from the past. One of those could be of you!

[The Producers Perks!] =============================
All of the above perks plus you will be named as a producer of the game in the opening credits. 
==============================
You will also get an official Producer T-shirt featuring original game cover art, an autographed rack card, a framed autographed game poster and an autographed limited edition hard copy! Only a 15 of these hard copies will ever be made. 
==============================
Wait! There's more!  An autographed hard copy edition of the Great Book of Backers, only 15 of these will ever be made! 
==============================
You will also get bragging rights and  the ability to give one on one input to the game devs during the projects development phase. We can collaborate via Skype, Facebook, PM or email.

[Vegas Release Party!] ===========================
Come party with us at our exclusive LAS VEGAS RELEASE PARTY! 
==============================
You get all the perks of the previous rewards plus a chance to to hang out with us in a fabulous Las Vegas getaway for two! Trip includes a two night stay at the luxurious Bellagio hotel and casino and round trip air for two if you live in the contiguous United States. Those living outside the USA must provide their own air travel. Must be 21 or older.
